Description

This is a code performance project for Stingray with the aim of handling large datasets (more than 1 million photons) that do not fit into memory (such as from AstroSat and NICER). The student will go through GitHub issues to see where Stingray workflows are breaking down in practical use cases, make a thorough profiling of the code, single out bottlenecks, and find solutions.

Deliverables

Deliverables for this project will be profiling and developing solutions for code bottlenecks and other hindrances to using Stingray library tools on large datasets.

To complete each milestone

  • Working unit tests for each piece of code

  • Documentation for each class, method and function implemented
